values: 邮政；邮件；邮寄；邮班；邮寄的信函（或包裹等）；岗位；职位；职务；工作；柱子；杆子；立柱；标杆；球门柱；哨所；（半定居地区的）贸易站；（赛马的）终点；帖子；博文；公告牌；告示牌；栏杆；护栏；（皇家海军中的）大舰队舰长；（证券交易所的）交易台；<美>派驻；驻军；<古>驿站；驿马
寄；邮寄；宣布；张贴；上岗；设岗；放哨；派驻；使驻守；派遣；委任；安置；配置；驿传；急速行进；<美>押（赌金）
马上；迅速地；用邮寄；以快递方式

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 记录；[会计] 过帐；委派

word_mean_info__list.difference: 侧重指社会地位较高，工作较为庄重，领取工资的职位。
普通用词，指人的职务，职位，岗位。
指任何不分高低贵贱的职位；有时侧重指在政府、法庭所谋求的职位。
正式用词，一般指雇员或为富有人家工作所担任的职位，现多见于广告中。

word_group.brief_definition: 情报侦听站；监听站；潜听哨；收听哨
设有邮局的镇；有邮政编码的镇
追溯既往的；有追溯效力的

bilingual.source: The State Post Bureau recently launched new postal services.
bilingual.target: 国家邮政局最近推出了新的邮政服务。

bilingual.source: He bought some stamps at the post office.
bilingual.target: 他在邮政局买了一些邮票。

bilingual.source: The post office usually opens at 9 AM.
bilingual.target: 邮政局通常在早上九点开门。

bilingual.source: I rented a P.O. Box at the post office.
bilingual.target: 我在邮局租了一个邮政信箱。

bilingual.source: The service at China Post is very reliable.
bilingual.target: 中国邮政的服务非常可靠。

bilingual.source: The delivery speed of China Post is very fast.
bilingual.target: 中国邮政的快递速度很快。

bilingual.source: The post office offers various mailing services.
bilingual.target: 邮政局提供多种邮寄服务。

bilingual.source: I went to China Post to mail a letter today.
bilingual.target: 我今天去中国邮政寄了一封信。

bilingual.source: Do you know where the nearest post office is?
bilingual.target: 你知道最近的邮政局在哪里吗？

bilingual.source: I like to use China Post to send important documents.
bilingual.target: 我喜欢使用中国邮政寄送重要文件。

list.abstract: post，英文单词，作名词、动词等，有职位、邮递、快速地等意思。

yingyinNormal.en: I had to fill the post.
yingyinNormal.zh: 总要有人担任那个职位。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, that'll be Errol with the post.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一定是爱洛送信来了。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets》

yingyinNormal.en: In a minute. You checked today's Post? Yeah. Today's.
yingyinNormal.zh: 等会儿，你查过今天的邮报吗？对，今天的。

yingyinNormal.en: Abandoning your post. Inciting a scurry. Reckless endangerment of rodents...
yingyinNormal.zh: 擅离职守，引发公众恐慌，危及啮齿动物生命…

yingyinNormal.en: Ms. Zoe zebra. Zoe zebra Zoe zebra Zoe zebra. Oh, all the post is for Zoe. That's my letter. Can I post it? Certainly.
yingyinNormal.zh: 斑马佐伊小姐的。斑马佐伊，斑马佐伊，斑马佐伊。所有的信都是佐伊的。那封是我的信。能让我来送吗？当然可以了。

yingyinNormal.en: Post. Peppa and George love it when the post arrives. We have got two letters. This one is for daddy pig. How exciting.
yingyinNormal.zh: 来信啦。佩奇和乔治最喜欢收信了。我们收到了两封信。这封是给猪爸爸的。真让人激动啊！

yingyinNormal.en: You can post the card here. Goodbye, postcard. Fly home quickly.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你可以把明信片投在这。再见明信片，快点飞回家。

yingyinNormal.en: I just got a parcel in the post. Can anyone guess what's inside?
yingyinNormal.zh: 邮局刚送来一个包裹！有谁来猜猜里面是什么？

yingyinNormal.en: You can post the card here. Goodbye, postcard. Fly home quickly.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你可以把明信片投在这。再见明信片，快点飞回家。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, just go to the post office. I'm sure they got her picture up.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我可以肯定她的照片就挂在邮局里面。

yingyinNormal.en: Our hours are 2:00 to 4:00. We're targeting the "post bars" demographic.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们的营业时间是两点到四点，专门面向过完夜生活的人群。

yingyinNormal.en: Post. Hello, Mr. Zebra. Hello, Daddy Pig. I've got some letters for you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是邮递员！你好啊，斑马先生！你好啊，猪爸爸！这里有几封信是你们的。

yingyinNormal.en: Chandler, I want you to run a post pattern to the left, okay. And sweetie.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要你左边防守，而亲爱的，你…

yingyinNormal.en: Daddy Zebra is going to bed now. He has to get up early to deliver the post.
yingyinNormal.zh: 斑马爸爸现在要上床睡觉了。他必须早早起床去送信。

yingyinNormal.en: Wait! I know. I'm going to conduct an interview with myself and post it online.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我知道啦，做个自访，然后放到网上去。

yingyinNormal.en: So, this is the post office, cause where else are they gonna get their "bills"?
yingyinNormal.zh: 这里是邮局，不然它们就收不到账单[喙]了。

yingyinNormal.en: Race you to the post box. The children are all posting letters to Father Christmas.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们来比赛谁先到邮筒！所有的小朋友都寄信给圣诞老人。

yingyinNormal.en: So you checked the paper for listings in Brooklyn Heights, right? You checked the Post?
yingyinNormal.zh: 报纸上布鲁克林高地的租屋广告，你都看过了？邮报你有查过吗？

yingyinNormal.en: It is early morning. Mr Zebra the postman is delivering a letter to Peppa's house. Post.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在是清晨。邮递员斑马先生来给佩奇家送了一封信。来信了！

yingyinNormal.en: Peppa and George love it when the post arrives. It's address to Ms. Peppa Pig. That's me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩奇和乔治很高兴能收到信。这封信是寄给小猪佩奇的。是给我的。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

n. 装饰画；发帖人；海报；广告；招贴；招贴画；布告
n. 邮递员
n. 邮寄；邮递；邮资；邮费
n. 任命；委任的职位；帖子；任职地点

word_family.mean: n. 柱；杆；桩；标桩；球门柱；邮政；邮递；驿马送信员；职位；职务；工作；岗位；皇家海军大舰长身份

sense_info_list.en: send a message to an Internet bulletin board or newsgroup

examination_example.sentence: I've found quite a few, and—since I started <highlight>posting</highlight> them on Twitter—they have been causing quite a stir.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我发现了不少，而且自从我开始在twitter上发布它们以来，它们已经引起了相当大的轰动。

examination_example.sentence: The author’s <highlight>posts</highlight> on Twitter changed people’s impression of the Victorians.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 作者在推特上的帖子改变了人们对维多利亚时代的印象。

examination_example.sentence: How did smiling in photographs become a <highlight>post</highlight>-Victorian norm?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在照片中微笑是如何成为后维多利亚时代的标准的?

examination_example.sentence: The UK is on the verge of disappearing into an endless fever of self-celebration in its desperation to reinvent itself for the <highlight>post</highlight>-Brexit world.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 英国正濒临消失在一场没完没了的自我庆祝热潮中，它正拼命为后脱欧时代重塑自己。

examination_example.sentence: G.I. Bill for the 21st century ensures that every American has access to <highlight>post</highlight>-high school education.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 21世纪的《退伍军人权利法案》确保每个美国人都有机会接受高中后教育。

sense_info_list.zh: 职位; 哨所; 岗位

examination_example.sentence: Nowadays anyone applying for a research <highlight>post</highlight> has to have published twice the number of papers that would have been required only 10 years ago.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如今，任何申请研究职位的人都必须发表两倍于10年前所要求的论文数量。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>

sense_info_list.en: something such as a message or picture that you publish on a website or using social media

examination_example.sentence: Both individuals and businesses <highlight>post</highlight> regularly to engage and interact with people from around the world.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 个人和企业都定期发布帖子，与来自世界各地的人进行互动。

examination_example.sentence: People <highlight>post</highlight> their lives on social media for the world to see.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们在社交媒体上发布自己的生活，让全世界都看到。

examination_example.sentence: The so-called "ghostwriting" can take various forms: books, articles, autobiographies, and even social media <highlight>posts</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所谓的“代笔”可以采用各种形式：书籍、文章、自传，甚至社交媒体帖子。

邮寄; 邮件; 邮差

sense_info_list.en: something such as a message or picture that you publish on a website or using social media

examination_example.sentence: Help him <highlight>post</highlight> his drawings online.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 帮他把画发到网上。

examination_example.sentence: His teacher recognized Joe's talent and <highlight>posted</highlight> all his work online.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 乔的老师发现了乔的才能，并把他所有的作品都发布到了网上。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Post</highlight> pictures of her pet dog on social media.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在社交媒体上发布她的宠物狗的照片。

sense_info_list.zh: 邮寄; 邮件; 邮差

examination_example.sentence: Calling Telstra or picking up a parcel from Australia <highlight>Post</highlight> is followed by texts or emails with surveys asking, "How did we do?"
examination_example.sentence_trans: 打电话给澳洲电信或从澳大利亚邮政取包裹后，紧接着就会收到带调查问卷的短信或电子邮件，询问“我们做得怎么样?”

sense_info_list.zh: 公布; 张贴; 告示

examination_example.sentence: Kirsteen has now <highlight>posted</highlight> an image of a man suspected of stealing the dog.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 克里斯汀公布了一张涉嫌偷狗的男子的照片。

examination_example.sentence: Rule requires restaurant to <highlight>post</highlight> calorie counts right on the menu.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 规定要求餐厅要在菜单上公布卡路里的含量。

word_usage.usage: 表示“寄信”，英国人一般用post the letter，而美国人则习惯用mail the letter。

数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

sense_info_list.en: something such as a message or picture that you publish on a website or using social media

examination_example.sentence: With that thought in mind, Pruitt came up with a plan and <highlight>posted</highlight> it on the community website.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 抱着这种想法，Pruitt想出了一个计划，并在社区网站上发布。

examination_example.sentence: The day the <highlight>post</highlight> went live, Pruitt received thirty used bicycles.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 帖子发布的当天，Pruitt收到了30辆二手自行车。

examination_example.sentence: By tracking people's e-mails and online <highlight>posts</highlight>, scientists have found that good news can spread faster and farther than disasters and sob stories.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 通过追踪人们的电子邮件和网上帖子，科学家们发现，好消息比灾难和悲情故事传播得更快、更远。

sense_info_list.zh: 公布; 张贴; 告示

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 装饰画；发帖人；海报；广告；招贴；招贴画；布告
n. 明信片
n. 任命；委任的职位；帖子；任职地点
n. 邮递员

word_family.mean: n. 柱；杆；桩；标桩；球门柱；邮政；邮递；驿马送信员；职位；职务；工作；岗位；皇家海军大舰长身份

sense_info_list.en: something such as a message or picture that you publish on a website or using social media

examination_example.sentence: On Facebook, people <highlight>post</highlight> their news and photos.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们在脸书发布他们的新闻和照片。

examination_example.sentence: The most common social media activities are visiting friends' pages, reading their news, and commenting (评论) on their <highlight>posts</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最常见的社交媒体活动是访问朋友的主页、阅读他们的新闻和评论他们的帖子。

examination_example.sentence: So far, more than three global companies have <highlight>posted</highlight> their logo changes online.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 到目前为止，已经有超过三家全球性的公司在网上发布了他们的标志变更。

sense_info_list.zh: 邮寄; 邮件; 邮差; 邮报

examination_example.sentence: There is a <highlight>post</highlight> office next to the hotel.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 酒店旁边有一个邮局。

examination_example.sentence: Chen, head of China buyer research at Credit Suisse, told South China Morning <highlight>Post</highlight> in March.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 三月份，中国买家研究会的陈主管告诉《南华早报》。

examination_example.sentence: I want to <highlight>post</highlight> this letter now so you can get it by the weekend.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我想现在就把这封信寄出去，这样你就可以在周末之前收到它。

word_usage.usage: 表示“寄信”，英国人一般用post the letter，而美国人则习惯用mail the letter。
